faq.heading: Frequently asked questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know before you start

items.question: Do we have to commit from day one?
items.answer: No. You start with Core and only add Operations or Full Platform when it makes sense for your operation. There is no loss of data and no reimplementation when you upgrade.

items.question: How does the trial work?
items.answer: You test Fahrly with your own workflows. On request, we set up the account together with you and provide example data. No contract and no automatic renewal during the trial.

items.question: Are there minimum terms or long-term contracts?
items.answer: No. All plans are cancellable monthly. Annual plans are cheaper, but they are optional. You choose what fits your risk profile.

items.question: How much effort is the rollout?
items.answer: Core is usually ready to use within hours. Operations and Full Platform can be rolled out step by step and, if you like, with guided onboarding for dispatch and admin teams.

items.question: Will Fahrly work with our existing systems?
items.answer: Yes. Fahrly connects to common HR, payroll, telematics and reporting systems. If a specific integration is missing, we clarify that before you start so you can decide with full information.

items.question: What happens when we grow?
items.answer: You simply add users, modules or locations. Fahrly is designed for multi-depot operations, so you don’t need a new system or data migration when your fleet or team scales.
